whyChooseUs.title: We Deliver Excellence Along With Your Cargo
whyChooseUs.description: With over two decades of experience, we have built a reputation for reliability, efficiency, and customer-centric service. We go the extra mile to optimize your supply chain.
whyChooseUs.globalNetworkDesc: Extensive partnerships across 80+ countries ensuring seamless international logistics.
whyChooseUs.onTimeDeliveryDesc: Advanced tracking and optimized routing to ensure your cargo arrives on schedule.
whyChooseUs.secureInsuredDesc: Comprehensive cargo insurance and security protocols for peace of mind.
whyChooseUs.support247Desc: Dedicated support team available around the clock to handle any inquiries.
whyChooseUs.costEfficientDesc: Competitive rates and optimized logistics solutions to reduce your shipping costs.
whyChooseUs.industryCertifiedDesc: Fully licensed and certified by major international logistics associations.

cta.description: Experience world-class shipping solutions tailored to your business needs. Get a quote today and see the difference.

footer.tagline: Shipping The Future, Delivering Today. We connect global businesses with efficiency and reliability.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest shipping news and updates.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: Global Reach, Local Expertise. Get in touch with our logistics professionals today.
contactPage.intro: Whether you have a question about shipping rates, need assistance with a current shipment, or want to discuss a long-term partnership, we're here to help.
contactPage.subject: Subject
contactPage.successDesc: Thank you for contacting us. One of our team members will get back to you shortly.

servicesPage.heroDescription: End-to-end supply chain management tailored to your specific business needs. From air to sea, we cover it all.
servicesPage.customSolutionDesc: Our logistics experts are ready to design a supply chain strategy that fits your unique business requirements.
servicesPage.requestQuoteCardDesc: Need a customized shipping solution? Fill out our form to get a quick estimate.
servicesPage.contactExpertDesc: Have questions about this service? Reach out to our dedicated team.
servicesPage.readyDesc: Let us handle the logistics so you can focus on your business.

sea-freight.title: Sea Freight
sea-freight.shortDescription: Cost-effective container shipping solutions for large volume international trade.
sea-freight.fullDescription: As a cost-effective solution for large shipping volumes, our Sea Freight services connect you to major ports worldwide. We offer Full Container Load (FCL) and Less than Container Load (LCL) options, giving you flexibility regardless of your cargo size. Our strong relationships with shipping lines ensure space allocation and competitive pricing even during peak seasons.

air-freight.title: Air Freight
air-freight.shortDescription: Fast and reliable air cargo services for your time-sensitive shipments globally.
air-freight.fullDescription: When time is of the essence, our Air Freight services provide the speed and reliability you need. We partner with major commercial airlines and cargo carriers to offer flexible routing and competitive rates. Whether it's a small urgent parcel or oversized cargo, we handle it with precision and care, ensuring your goods reach their destination safely and on schedule.
benefits: Fastest transit times for urgent shipments
High security and lower risk of damage

road-transport.title: Inland Trucking
road-transport.shortDescription: Seamless domestic delivery tailored to your schedule.
road-transport.fullDescription: Seamless domestic delivery tailored to your schedule. We provide Express, Standard, and Scheduled delivery options with flexible pickup and temperature-controlled capabilities.
benefits: Cost-effective for short to medium distances

project-cargo.title: Project Cargo
project-cargo.shortDescription: Specialized handling for complex, oversized, and heavy-lift shipments.
project-cargo.fullDescription: Our Project Cargo team provides specialized handling for complex, oversized, and heavy-lift shipments. We manage every aspect of complex logistics projects, from route feasibility studies and permit acquisition to specialized loading equipment and real-time risk management, ensuring timely and safe delivery.
benefits: Expert handling of permits and regulations

customs-brokerage.title: Customs Brokerage
customs-brokerage.fullDescription: As a licensed Customs Broker (Ref No. 969/QĐ-TCHQ), our team ensures your shipments comply with all local and international laws, preventing delays and penalties. We handle all documentation, duty calculations, and filing processes, facilitating smooth clearance for your imports and exports.

value-added.title: Value-Added Services
value-added.shortDescription: Cargo insurance and specialized personal cargo handling.
value-added.fullDescription: Going beyond transport. We offer Cargo Insurance and specialized handling for Personal Cargo to ensure total peace of mind.
benefits: Peace of mind with insurance coverage

solution-consulting.title: Solution Consulting
solution-consulting.shortDescription: Tailored supply chain strategies to optimize efficiency and reduce costs.
solution-consulting.fullDescription: Every business has unique logistics challenges. Our Solution Consulting services analyze your current supply chain to identify inefficiencies and opportunities for improvement. We design tailored strategies that result in cost savings, improved speed-to-market, and enhanced scalability for your business growth.
